Balance Transfer: Balance transfer available up to 36 months, low profit rates. Easy cash transfers available. 0% Installment Payment Plan at Preferred Partners and Emirates airline website.
Travel_Points_Summary: Up to 0.15 BRight Rewards per AED
Special_Discount_Summary: Up to 30% off on Cleartrip, Valet Parking 3 times a month.
Hotel & Dining Offers: Up to 30% off on Cleartrip. BRight Rewards redemption available for 300,000+ hotel stay options.
Valet Parking: 3 times a month at over 35 locations
Other Key Benefits: Supplementary Cards available. Secured transactions via Samsung Pay, Mobile Banking, Contactless, 3D Secure, and CHIP & PIN.
